column1: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions. Optimization Content Delivery Network Testing Automation Stay hungry
Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great. Framework Serverless Cache Invalidation Backend Automation Python Blockchain Pull Request Multi-threading Edge Computing
Great things never come from comfort zones. If you can dream it
column2: you can do it. API Microservices Deployment Sharding Multi-threading Performance Agile GraphQL JWT
